Title: Venture Global signs 20-year deal with SEFE unit for 2.25 mtpa of LNG from CP2 LNG project
Description: US LNG project developer Venture Global has signed a deal with a Wingas, a unit of Germany’s state-owned Securing Energy for Europe, or SEFE, to buy 2.25 mtpa of LNG from its proposed 20 mtpa CP2 LNG project in Louisiana, with it contributing to the sale of almost half the project’s capacity.
Author: CK
